resources.string: This app is a demonstration of a using a Messenger to communicate with a service.
The service is starting, it may take a minute or two...
Tried to connect to service, but failed.
One-way communication, activity to service. The service will display a Toast when it receives the message.

Two-way communication. This Activity will send a Message to the service. The service will reply back to the Activity with a Message. The contents of the Message will be displayed in the Status area below.
The permission to request a timestamp from the timestamp service.
The permissions to utilized the features of the timestamp service.
